title: Miles the Nile Crocodile
description: Miles is a very lonely crocodile. Everyone in the Nile is afraid of him even though he is a vegetarian. Read Miles the Nile Crocodile to find out what happens to Miles as he travels down the Nile in search of a friend. This book can be used to teach students how to identify the problem and solution in a story as well as the proper use of quotation marks.
meta: basks, crocodile, papyrus, pyramids, sighs, vegetarian
Problem and Solution : Identify problem and solution
Quotation Marks : Recognize and use quotation marks
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word down

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
